title: Client Freezes When searching through champion skins and or champions!
body: Creating this post to see if this happens to anyone else. While looking through champions and or skins the client just freezes? This has caused me to dodge several queues in which this isnt my fault and i get penalized for it. I have talked with my friends and it happens to them too. Share this post so that this error can be fixed!{{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}  Thanks for reading !

replies.body:
There were some recent problematic Windows Updates that were causing issues in Hextech Crafting but may also be affecting champ profiles. I recommend ensuring you have the latest [windows updates](http://www.update.microsoft.com/) installed or rolling back recent updates if you still see the issue after updating. 

Let me know if this helped.
